articles.author: Joe Rao
articles.title: See the fiery Blood Moon rise in a total lunar eclipse in May's must-see skywatching event - Space.com
articles.description: If the weather is clear, skywatchers across most of the Americas, Europe and Africa will have a view of one of nature's most beautiful spectacles: a total eclipse of the moon.
articles.content: On the night of May 15-16, the attention of millions of people will be drawn skyward, where a mottled, coppery globe — the moon — will be completely immersed in the long, tapering cone of shadow cast… [+7400 chars]

articles.title: Blood Moon total lunar eclipse 2022: Everything you need to know - Space.com
articles.description: It will be visible in parts of the Americas, Antarctica, Europe, Africa, the east Pacific, New Zealand, eastern Europe and the Middle East.
articles.content:
The first lunar eclipse of 2022 will take place on May 15 and 16, depending on your time zone.
